title: Watch Anushka Sharma, Diljit Dosanjh, Anshai Lal’s EXCLUSIVE Phillauri Interview Now - Bollywood Hungama
text: Home » Videos » Celeb Interview » Anushka Sharma, Diljit Dosanjh, Anshai Lal’s EXCLUSIVE Phillauri Interview Anushka Sharma, Diljit Dosanjh, Anshai Lal’s EXCLUSIVE Phillauri Interview Zahid Shaikh Feb 7, 2017 - 1:42 pm IST 0 0 About the video In the first part of their Bollywood Hungama Exclusive Interview, Anushka Sharma, Diljit Dosanjh and Anshai Lal talk about their upcoming film 'Phillauri'. Diljit opens up on getting varied roles in Bollywood than what he does in Punjabi films. Anushka talks about the story and her character in the film. Don't Miss!
